content:
alexcrichton commented on issue #6296:

I'll note as well that the reason I'm doing this for 8.0.0 and for 7.0.0 is in case we make patch release in the future for these branches. This should hopefully mean that future patch releases are all fixed.

alexcrichton commented on issue #6296:

Ok given https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/issues/6300 I went through and downloaded all the artifacts, unpacked them, renamed the directory, and then repacked and reuploaded. This was done for both the 7.0.1 and 8.0.1 release which were both affected.
